articles.title: Possible Stock Splits in 2026: 2 Unstoppable Stocks Up 450% and 550% in 3 Years to Buy Now, According to Wall Street

articles.summary: Motley Fool: Possible Stock Splits in 2026: 2 Unstoppable Stocks Up 450% and 550% in 3 Years to Buy Now, According to Wall Street. After strong gains, Wall Street says these two industry leaders still have more upside in 2026. Related tickers mentioned: WSFX.BO.

articles.title: Ad Launching Platform Ads Uploader Exits Beta with Users in 30 Countries
articles.mainIdea: Ad Launching Platform Ads Uploader Exits Beta with Users in 30 Countries
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Ad Launching Platform Ads Uploader Exits Beta with Users in 30 Countries. New platform supports advanced Meta advertising workflows, including sales, lead generation, and messaging campaignsNew York, NY , Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ads Uploader, a SaaS platform built to help agencies and brands manage Facebook and Instagram advertising at scale, today announced its transition out of public beta following adoption by advertising teams across 30 countries. articles.mainIdea: Get Ready for a Fruity Facebook as Meta Preps New Mango AI Model. Should You Buy META Stock Here?
articles.summary: Barchart: Get Ready for a Fruity Facebook as Meta Preps New Mango AI Model. Should You Buy META Stock Here?. Meta is apparently preparing a Mango AI model in addition to the Avocado model that was recently reported.
